channel.title: EDCON 2019 + MESG's first decentralized execution
channel.description:
EDCON has just finished, so this is an update on the event, and the cool things that are happening in the blockchain space.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/edcon-2019-the-first-decentralized-execution-with-mesg/
